title: The Gator Baiter
description: The Gator Baiter educates the masses about animal conservation, including the very dangerous alligator.
quote: This naughty little Sheila can snap a man’s ribcage like… Like that!
altHero: The Gator Baiter, a zookeeper man in nature
alt1: Gator Baiter with his head in a gator’s mouth
alt3: gator biting the Gator Baiter in the crotch
alt4: Gator Baiter talking while the gator is biting his torso
